Name: Fruits De La Passion
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop fresh into shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Passion fruit and almond give this cognac cocktail tropical fruity notes with a splash of soda opening and adding effervescence.
History: Created in 2015 by Robert Flight at Smiths, Ongar, Essex, England.
